items.description: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of “Avengers: Endgame.”

items.description: The Fantastic Four meet their greatest challenge yet as the enigmatic, intergalactic herald, The Silver Surfer, comes to Earth to prepare it for destruction.

items.description: Marvel Studios LEGENDS celebrates the heroes and villains of the highly anticipated Disney+ shows.

items.title: WandaVision
items.description: Wanda Maximoff and Vision—two super-powered beings living idealized suburban lives—begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

items.description: Agent Phil Coulson leads a team of highly skilled agents from the S.H.I.E.L.D. Together, they combat extraordinary and inexplicable threats.

items.title: The Strongest Man in the World
items.description: Dexter Riley and his friends accidentally discover a new chemical mixed with a cereal seems to give anyone temporary superhuman strength.

items.title: Turner & Hooch
items.description: Detective Turner leads an orderly life until he meets Hooch, a rambunctious dog with whom he has to find a killer.

items.title: Herbie Rides Again
items.description: Hawk wants to build a shopping mall but, a widow won't sell the remaining plot. He resorts to evil schemes not knowing that she has an ace up her sleeve.

items.title: Valiant
items.description: At the height of World War II, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is he a war-hero in the making?

items.title: The Rescuers
items.description: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

items.title: The Reluctant Dragon
items.description: Robert Benchley learns about the animation process at Walt Disney Studios while trying to pitch Walt Disney the idea of making a cartoon about a shy dragon.

items.title: Tron
items.description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

items.title: Jungle 2 Jungle
items.description: Manhattan broker Michael Cromwell learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.

items.title: Willow
items.description: In a magical world, a young man named Willow is chosen to undertake a perilous journey to protect a special baby from an evil queen.

items.title: Return from Witch Mountain
items.description: Los Angeles is on the brink of disaster when two greedy criminals manipulate two kids with supernatural powers.

items.title: The Prince And The Pauper
items.description: Tom Canty, a poor English boy, bears a striking resemblance to Edward, Prince of Wales. The two boys meet and play a joke on the court by switching places.

items.title: Snow White And The Seven Dwarfs
items.description: Snow White, a princess, runs away from an evil queen who wants to kill her but she meets the seven dwarfs who not only rescue her but also become her friends.

items.title: Aladdin
items.description: Aladdin falls in love with Princess Jasmine. To marry her, he finds a magic lamp that turns him into a prince, but first, he must face the evil Jafar.

items.title: The Lion King
items.description: Naive cub Simba is made to believe that he killed his father hence he flees into exile. After several years, he returns to claim his kingdom.

items.title: Finding Nemo
items.description: When Nemo, a young clownfish, is unexpectedly carried far from home, his father and Dory embark on a journey to find Nemo.

items.title: Cinderella
items.description: Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, but her dream comes true with some help from her Fairy Godmother and her friends.

items.title: Sleeping Beauty
items.description: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break with the help of three good fairies.

items.title: The Jungle Book
items.description: Mowgli makes his way to the man-village with Bagheera, the wise panther, on the way he meets new friends who teach him the true meaning of friendship.

items.title: Robin Hood
items.description: Robin Hood conjures up one famously funny and daring deed after another to outfox greedy Prince John and bring happiness to the residents of Sherwood Forest.

items.title: The Great Mouse Detective
items.description: When Professor Ratigan kidnaps London's master toymaker, Basil has to engage in a battle of wits with his nemesis to foil his evil plans.

items.title: Savage Kingdom
items.description: In the epic sequel to the Savage Kingdom: Season 3 – Mayhem comes the eagerly awaited real-life drama from the heart of Mombo, Northern Botswana.

items.title: Wicked Tuna
items.description: In one of the most regulated fisheries on earth, the giant Bluefin tuna fishermen of Gloucester battle to make a living by catching one tuna at a time.

items.title: Ultimate Viper: Fear The Fang
items.description: This feature explains why the venomous vipers are so lethal and why should we protect them?

items.title: Save This Rhino
items.description: National Geographic turns its lens to India to explore rhino conservation with renowned cricketer Kevin Pietersen.

items.title: South America's Weirdest
items.description: The series dives into the depths of the South American wild to investigate the cast of misfits, the oddities, the weird, the eccentric and the truly bizarre.

items.title: Running Wild
items.description: Survivalist Bear Grylls returns to the wild with some of Hollywood's most beloved celebrities who join him on a no-holds-barred journey through some of the most extreme environments in the world.

items.title: Madagascar's Weirdest
items.description: In this series, explore the mysterious island of Madagascar as we go in search of critters who exhibit traits so absurd it will be sure to boggle your mind!

items.title: Growing Up Animal
items.description: Heart-warming stories following the development of baby animals on the magical journey from the mysteries of the womb to the challenges of the wild.

items.title: World's Deadliest Snakes
items.description: This series showcases the most dangerous snakes on earth. What makes them so lethal, and what tactics do they employ to ambush and ultimately kill their victims?

items.title: Asia's Weirdest
items.description: From the lush tropical islands of Indonesia's archipelago to the wide-open Mongolian steppe, this is a land where you should expect the unexpected.

items.title: Europe's New Wild
items.description: The series is an inspiring story of the wild rebirth of a continent as it reveals the resurgence of nature across Europe's most breathtaking landscapes.

items.title: Asia's Wild Secrets
items.description: From the snow leopards in the Himalayas to the vultures soaring over the Tibetan Plateau, the series showcases Asia's most iconic wildlife and its oddities.

items.title: Cecil: The Legacy Of A King
items.description: While Cecil's demise at the hand of hunters was splashed across the media, sparking fury in all who heard his tale, his story before he was posthumously iconized is worthy of celebrating.

items.title: Frozen Kingdom Of the Snow Leopard
items.description: This is the story of a devout female snow leopard who settles into an unfamiliar valley to give birth and raise her two cubs despite incredible odds.

items.title: Equator's Wild Secrets
items.description: The series explores Equator's wildest and most diverse ecosystems like Amazon, Andes, Galapagos Islands, Borneo and Sumatra, Africa, and the Coral Sea.

items.title: Animals Gone Wild
items.description: Learn the wildness of animal behaviour with the inimitable Jaaved Jaaferi, who gives us a peek into their bizarre and fascinating world.

items.title: Predator Bloodlines
items.description: It is through this mechanism that individuals inherit the unique code for survival.

items.title: Wonders of the Ocean
items.description: The Pacific is the largest and deepest ocean on our planet. This series showcases the many incredible creatures that call the Pacific home.

items.title: Planet Possible
items.description: This series reveals the hidden splendours of India’s natural world, exploring rarely seen species and habitats.

items.title: Diary Of A Teen Leopard
items.description: Pemba, a mamma's boy, is forced to mature fast after her mother's injury to survive! Can he sever those apron strings and face his fears to launch into adulthood?

items.title: Ford v Ferrari
items.description: Caroll Shelby and Ken Miles battle against all the odds to build a race car for Ford Motor Company and take on the dominant Ferraris at the Le Mans in 1966.

items.title: Safety

items.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
items.description: A heartfelt tale narrated by a philosophical dog named Enzo, who through his bond with his owner, has gained tremendous insight into the human condition.

items.title: Breaking Away
items.description: A bittersweet comedy about a bicycle enthusiast in a small college town trying to sort out his future while training for the two biggest races of his life.

items.title: Ice Princess
items.description: With the help of her coach and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, Casey pursues her dream to be a champion figure skater against her mother's wishes.

items.title: Like Mike
items.description: When a hoops-loving teenager with a dream to play in the NBA finds a mysterious pair of old sneakers, he makes the leap from playground hijinks to superstardom.

items.title: Rookie of The Year
items.description: An accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, making him a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

items.title: The Sandlot
items.description: Scott has moved into his neighbourhood and to fit in with the neighbours join the local sandlot ball team. But, he doesn't know how to play baseball.

items.description: After severe hardships, things begin to change for Vince when he manages to get into a football team and enjoys a career as a professional footballer.

items.title: Secretariat

items.description: The Ducks win scholarships to a snooty private school but, their new coach adds to their woes as they fight hard to save their scholarships.

items.description: Naive cub Simba is made to believe that he killed his father hence he flees into exile. After several years, he returns to claim his kingdom.

items.description: An adventure about Lady, a pampered cocker spaniel, and Tramp, a roguish mutt, with whom she learns what it means to be footloose and leash-free.

items.description: Wooden boy Pinocchio embarks on fantastic adventures that test his bravery and honesty until he triumphs in his quest to become a real boy.

items.description: A kindhearted troll takes refuge in Central Park and, after meeting some friends, they let loose their mischievous magic on New York City.

items.description: Maria arrives at the Von Trapp mansion as governess to the seven children of a widowed naval captain bringing love, life, and music into their lives.

items.description: Why was Elsa born with magical powers? Together with Anna, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven, she sets out on a dangerous but remarkable journey to find the answer.

items.description: Despite the best efforts of a jealous friend, Kelly and Justin, two college students meet and fall in love during Spring Break in Fort Lauderdale.

items.title: Strange Magic
items.description: A colourful fairy tale musical inspired by "A Midsummer Night's Dream" where goblins, elves, fairies, and imps battle over a powerful potion.

items.title: Epic
items.description: Mary is transported to a deep forest that is in a war between the forces of good and evil. She joins forces with a rag-tag group to save their and her worlds.

items.description: In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.

items.description: Olaf sets out to comb the kingdom to bring home the best traditions for Elsa and Anna for the holidays.

items.description: Best friends Raven and Chelsea are together again and raising their three children, Raven's 11-year-old twins Booker and Nia, and Chelsea's 9-year-old son Levi.

items.title: Best of Luck Nikki
items.description: Dolly creates a video diary about their family and friends containing advice for Nikki when she grows up.

items.title: Wizards of Waverly Place
items.description: Alex, Justin, and Max Russo are not your ordinary teenagers – they’re secretly wizards in training!

items.title: Nona
items.description: A grandmother's plan for a day alone is upended by an unexpected visit from her granddaughter.

items.title: Doogie Kamealoha, M.D.
items.description: NEW EPISODE EVERY WEDNESDAY AT 12:30 PM. A 16-year-old prodigy juggles her budding medical career with the daily challenges of teenage life.

items.title: Luca
items.description: The movie is a coming-of-age story about one young boy experiencing an unforgettable summer filled with gelato, pasta and endless scooter rides.

items.title: Raya and the Last Dragon
items.description: Raya, a fallen princess, must track down the legendary last dragon to stop the evil forces that have returned and threaten her world.

items.title: The Mysterious Benedict Society
items.description: Four gifted orphans are recruited by the peculiar Mr. Benedict for a dangerous mission to save the world from a global crisis known as The Emergency.

items.title: That Darn Cat!
items.description: After a kidnapped bank teller uses a neighbor's wandering cat to send an S.O.S., the F.B.I. assigns a cat-allergic Agent to the case.

items.title: Snowball Express
items.description: John Baxter inherits a rundown hotel in the Colorado Rockies and decides to convert it into a ski lodge. He moves with his family to start their new life at the lodge, but they soon find it is more difficult than they had expected.

items.title: Big Shot
items.description: After getting ousted from the NCAA, a hothead men’s basketball coach must take a job at an all-girls high school in an eﬀort to redeem his career and reputation.

items.title: The Mighty Ducks: Game Changers
items.description: A new group of misfits rediscovers the joys of playing hockey for the love of the game.

items.title: Disney Kirby Buckets
items.description: Welcome to Kirby's world! It's rude, crude, and totally sketchy. On his adventures Kirby is joined by his animated characters, coming off the page and interacting with his world.

items.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
items.description: Alexander braves multiple calamities making him wonder if bad things only happen to his family - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

items.description: Flora, an imaginative 10-year old cynic, couldn't have predicted that her little superhero squirrel will have the uncanny knack for helping her and her family.

items.title: Austin & Ally
items.description: Following the lives of Austin, an aspiring confident musician, Ally, a quiet talented songwriter and their two friends.

items.title: Out of the Box
items.description: Every day, a small group of neighbourhood children come and play in "The Box," an imaginary clubhouse made entirely out of painted cardboard boxes.

items.title: Pixar Popcorn
items.description: Grab a quick snack of Pixar with this collection of mini shorts starring your favorite characters.

items.title: Moana
items.description: A young woman uses her navigational talents to set sail for a fabled island. Joining her on the adventure is her hero, the legendary demi-god Maui.

items.title: Turner & Hooch
items.description: NEW EPISODE EVERY WEDNESDAY AT 12:30 PM. A Deputy Marshal inherits an unruly dog who helps him solve crimes and investigate a family mystery.

items.title: A Galaxy of Sounds
items.description: A Galaxy of Sounds immerses audiences in the nostalgic ambience of a galaxy far, far away.

items.title: Star Wars: Visions
items.description: An animated anthology celebrating Star Wars through the lens of the world’s best anime creators.

items.title: Nona
items.description: A grandmother's plan for a day alone is upended by an unexpected visit from her granddaughter.

items.title: Twenty Something
items.description: Adulting is hard. One day you're nailing it, the next you're a stack of kids hiding in a trenchcoat.

items.title: Dug Days
items.description: Dug Days is a new collection of shorts that follows the humorous misadventures of Dug, the lovable dog from Disney and Pixar’s Up.

items.description: Goofy’s back in a trio of all-new, hand-drawn animated shorts from Walt Disney Animation Studios.

items.title: The Good, The Bart, and The Loki

items.description: Zenimation pays tribute to both the visual and sound artists who have created Walt Disney Animation Studios’ legacy of films.

items.description: Ameena, a homesick Muslim Pakistani immigrant, wakes up on Eid to find out she has to go to school.

items.description: Short Circuit, an experimental, innovative program where anyone at the Studio can pitch an idea and get selected to create their own short film.

items.description: A lonely Mexican-American woman unknowingly summons a dark and ancient creature.

items.title: Marvel Studios LEGENDS
items.description: Marvel Studios LEGENDS celebrates the heroes and villains of the highly anticipated Disney+ shows.

items.description: A Chinese student uncovers his true identity when trying out for a leadership role at a U.S. school.

items.description: In a daycare far, far away… but still in Springfield, Maggie is on an epic quest for her stolen pacifier.

items.title: 22 vs. Earth
items.description: 22 refuses to go to Earth, enlisting a gang of 5 other new souls in her attempt at rebellion.
